Title: Wound
Text: Healing: If you don't recruit any Heroes or defeat any Villains on your turn, you may KO all the Wounds from your hand.

Title: Bindings
Text: Betrayal: If you don't recruit any Allies or defeat any Adversaries or Commanders on your turn, you may KO a Bindings from your hand. If you do, the player to your right gains all the other Bindings from your hand.

Title: Blinding Flash
Text: Healing: You may discard a card and have each other player discard a card. If you do, KO this Wound.

Title: Blunt Force Trauma
Text: Healing: You may spend 5 Attack. If you do, KO this Wound.

Title: Corrosive Webbing
Text: Healing: You may KO this Wound. If you do, gain another Wound.

Title: Fatal Blow
Text: Healing: You may KO a Hero that costs 1 or more from your hand or discard pile. If you do, KO this Wound.

Title: Psychic Trauma
Text: Healing: You may spend 5 Recruit. If you do, KO this Wound.

Title: Spreading Nanovirus
Text: Healing: You may have the player on your left gain this Wound.

Title: Subdermal Tracker
Text: Healing: You may play a card from the Villain Deck. If you do, KO this Wound.
